ℹ️ The boss has responded to reports about the future of our no.10. 

#MUFC || #BREMUN

🔊 "I know we have to win every game and I know everyone expects us to win every game, so we have to deal with that," Erik adds.  

"All I can do is prepare my team as well as I can and I'm focusing on that." 💪

#MUFC || #BREMUN

🗯 Erik: "We learnt a lot [from the first game] but it's normal when you start a season, every season in that part is the same.

"You have a new start, you make mistakes. Football is a game of mistakes, so we know we have to improve in many factors." 

#MUFC || #BREMUN

💬 "After every game, I analyse what went wrong and where we can improve, where we have to improve, and how we have to train," Erik says. 

"We tell and show the players this too, to give them the solutions." 👊

We'll don our new @adidasFootball away strip for the first time on Tuesday 19 July, when we take on Crystal Palace at the @MCG. 

#MUFC || #MUTOUR22 https://t.co/4qWruMGhbU

♻️ Looking to the future.

The shirt is made with 100% recycled materials and features the latest in @adidasFootball’s temperature regulation innovation, HEAT.RDY – KEEP COOL, which is designed to keep players feeling cool, dry and confident.

#MUFC https://t.co/X35hjdCPbc

🧬 Tapping into our heritage.

A subtle helix pattern is engineered into the fabric of the shirt, drawing inspiration from the DNA and rich graphical identity of iconic United jerseys. 

#MUFC || @adidasFootball https://t.co/bPwgaQG2GG

🔴⚫️🔴 United through and through.

For the first time in our history, two-tone black and red three-stripe details feature across the shoulders of the shirt, as all three core club colours come together through the kit.

💭 "There will be some changes [next season] because there are quite a few players whose contracts are expiring," Ralf adds.

"I'm positive that with the right new players to add to ours already here, the pathway could be a very positive one." ✊

#MUFC | #BHAMUN

💬 Ralf: "What I liked about the [Brentford] game is you could see that they had fun playing together. 

"They were enjoying themselves on the pitch and this is exactly the kind of approach we need tomorrow as well." 💪

#MUFC | #BHAMUN

🔊 "We spoke after the Brentford game that it was one of our best games in possession of the ball and one of our best games in the last six months," Ralf says.

"I am positive the team will try to play on the same level against Brighton." ⚡️

#MUFC | #PL

🔊 "We have quite a few players missing tomorrow, and one or two still with question marks, so we will have to wait and see [who will be involved]," Ralf adds.

"We will play the best possible team out of those players that are available." ✊

#MUFC | #MUNCHE

💭 Ralf: "We have to perform and show, in front of 75,000 [supporters] again, that we are able to beat a team like Chelsea. 

"This is our job, this is what everybody has to do and this is what we are working at for the whole week in preparation for the game." 💪

#MUFC | #MUNCHE https://t.co/uVIBQqmbdr

💬 "We must try to get as many points as we possibly can out of our last four games, so we need to play on the best level possible," Ralf says. 

"We know that Chelsea are a good team, but if we play well, it's possible to win the game." ✊

🎤 "I love the Champions League, it's a competition where the finer details are very important," concludes @AT13Oficial.

🗣 "We have a fantastic opportunity to be in the top eight teams in Europe if we beat them tomorrow," adds Ralf.

💬 "Like in the game against Spurs, we need our players and our supporters on top form," says Ralf.

"The fans can be not only our 12th, but our 13th player on the pitch. But it's up to us to create moments for them." 🔊

🚨 Ralf Rangnick's latest team news has landed ⬇️

#MUFC | #MCIMUN

🧠 "My focus is on the upcoming games and getting the best out of the current players and team," Ralf adds. 

"I am here for now until the end of the season. For me it is important to develop the players and the team." 📈

#MUFC | #MCIMUN

🗣 "There will be a lot of tactical work, waiting for transitional moments and taking our chances [on Sunday]," Ralf continues.

"[Against Watford] we were compact and didn't allow them many chances. That is what we need for Manchester City." ✊

#MUFC | #MCIMUN

💬 "We've created a lot of chances in our last 10 or 11 games but we need to finish them," Ralf says. 

"I'd be worried if we didn't create chances but the way we've been playing and creating chances is good." 💪

#MUFC | #MCIMUN

🚨 Two first-team Reds will be unavailable for #LEEMUN, but Ralf revealed a midfielder returned to training on Friday 💪🔴

#MUFC

🗯 "Our team have so much experience playing against teams in this type of atmosphere," Ralf adds.

"I think everybody prefers to play in a sold-out stadium rather than in an empty stadium and therefore it's good. We are very much looking forward to that." 🏟

#MUFC | #LEEMUN

👣 "It's important for us to be on the front foot, similar to what we did against Brighton in the second half," Ralf continues.

"It will be a different game [to Brighton] and we have to take it one game [at a time]." 💬

#MUFC | #LEEMUN

🗣 "Leeds are a team that play with the highest amount of speed, so it's important for us not to allow them to play like that," Ralf says.

"We are well prepared to play for 90 minutes and stick to the game plan." 💪

ℹ️ Our interim boss has given the latest on his squad ahead of #BREMUN... 

#MUFC | #PL

📣 Ralf says: "What [@Cristiano] has done in his career so far is amazing. I mean, 800 competitive goals, nobody has achieved that before in the last, I don't know, 80 or 100 years.

"This shows what kind of player he is, what an exceptional player he is." 🌟

#MUFC | #BREMUN

🗣 "I think [Elanga] did well. He showed me exactly what I expected him to deliver in that game [on Saturday]," Ralf continues.

"He listens and he's trying to put all the effort into his game. I was pleased with his performance in the 75 minutes he played."

#MUFC | #BREMUN

💬 Ralf adds: "Nobody will expect this to be an easy game but the same was true before we played Aston Villa.

"We have to show a similar performance tomorrow at Brentford, but not only for 70 minutes, for 90-95, 97, 98 minutes, however long the game takes." 💪

#MUFC | #BREMUN

🔊 "If I compare our two games [against Aston Villa], I think we did a lot better in the league game at Villa Park," Ralf says.

"I liked our game in possession, the structure and the way we pressed. We have to build on that at Brentford." 📈

#MUFC | #BREMUN
